title: Does anyone know when the new SKT T1 skins are going to come out?
body:
Hey everyone, 
i was wondering if the new skins are going to be released. 
Does anyone know when?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: July 5th was the most recent update I'd heard
I think next patch, maybe 1 week?

1 week? maybe but i really like the new SKT T1 skin and i got my RP ready for the skin XD 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
More like 11 days, if we're talking about the next patch, as patches are generally applied on Wednesdays.
